This class is meant to keep all Server / Project related configuration parameters handy for the program to access at run time.

Service - Interface in com.kousikraj.bootstrap.services
This is the primary interface where all the methods needed for Service implementation is defined.

ServiceDirectory - Class in com.kousikraj.bootstrap.lookups
This class serves as directory for all the services that are loaded by BootstrapConfigurations.

Initializing all the services.
ServiceLookup - Class in com.kousikraj.bootstrap.lookups
This class is a lookup utility where it uses Java Reflection to initialize the object that are specified in BootstrapConfigurations (loaded from bootstrap.properties file).
ServiceLookup() - Constructor for class com.kousikraj.bootstrap.lookups.ServiceLookup

This method is for Shutting down all the Services that are started for the CURRENT_STATE.
